name: Payments Reconciliation Engine with SWIFT Gateway
description: Payments Reconciliation Engine with SWIFT Gateway underwrites transactions and prices customer profiles; applies decision gates and observability; orchestrates via Payment Hub to optimize liquidity.

steps.name: Customer Intake
steps.description: Collect, validate and normalize positions from SWIFT Gateway; attach a runId and timestamp for traceability.

steps.name: Retrieve
steps.description: Execute retrieve phase for the RAG pattern: persist interim state, enforce guardrails, and emit structured JSON results.

steps.name: Ground
steps.description: Execute ground phase for the RAG pattern: persist interim state, enforce guardrails, and emit structured JSON results.

steps.name: Sanctions Screening
steps.description: Sanctions Screening across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Limit Control
steps.description: Limit Control across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Underwriting
steps.description: Underwriting across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Risk Scoring
steps.description: Risk Scoring across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Reconciliation Summary
steps.description: Assemble final payload with status, artifacts, KPIs and audit trail; store to Case Management; return response JSON for the client.
